about_the_game:
Phantom Pursuit is a heart-pounding 3v5 asymmetric multiplayer horror game where survival hinges on quick thinking, agility, and teamwork. Three human Pursuers must navigate haunted environments, evading five relentless Spirits. In a world where fighting back isn’t an option, the Pursuers’ only hope is to run, hide, and use their surroundings to slow down the ghostly hunters long enough to escape.

The Spirits, however, are always lurking — able to phase through walls, set spectral traps, and manipulate the world to close in on their prey. The clock is ticking. Will you escape with your life, or be consumed by the shadows?

Choose Your Side

  • Pursuers (3 Players): As a Pursuer, you are powerless against the Spirits. Your only goal is to survive and escape the haunted environment. Use tools and environmental traps to slow down the Spirits, giving you and your teammates precious seconds to flee or hide. Communicate and coordinate with your team to outwit the spectral enemies and make it out alive. Remember — you can't fight back, but you can run and outsmart your pursuers.

  • Spirits (5 Players): The Spirits are terrifying entities with supernatural powers that make them formidable hunters. With abilities like phasing through walls, setting ghostly traps, and manipulating the environment, the Spirits’ goal is simple: hunt down and capture all the Pursuers before they can escape. Your powers grow stronger the longer you remain undetected — find the perfect moment to strike and ensure no one escapes your grasp.

Key Features

  • Asymmetric Multiplayer: A thrilling 3v5 horror experience where human Pursuers must evade and escape from Spirits who have the upper hand in power and abilities.

  • Escape-Oriented Gameplay: Pursuers are defenseless against the Spirits and must rely on strategy, quick reflexes, and environmental tools to slow their enemies down and escape. No combat — only survival.

  • Supernatural Hunters: Spirits have a wide array of terrifying abilities that allow them to phase through objects, set deadly traps, and outmaneuver the Pursuers. Every Spirit has unique powers, ensuring no hunt plays out the same way.

  • Dynamic Environments: Explore eerie, atmospheric locations filled with hiding spots, traps, and supernatural threats. The environments are dangerous for both Pursuers and Spirits, providing opportunities for escape and ambush alike.

  • Intense Team Play: Communication is key. Pursuers must work together to set traps, find safe hiding spots, and plan their escapes, while Spirits will need to coordinate to corner and capture their prey.

Run, Hide, Survive

In Phantom Pursuit, the race for survival is relentless. As a Pursuer, you must outwit, outmaneuver, and outrun the powerful Spirits that seek to drag you into the darkness. Can you escape, or will you fall victim to the phantom menace? Choose your side and dive into the thrilling, supernatural world of Phantom Pursuit — the hunt is on!

  • Graphics: GTX 960 or Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
